DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : EARNINGS
DOC.TEXT: Exxon Corp . Profit Up 7 % : The company credited the gain to higher profits for refining and marketing efforts as well as its chemical operation , which also benefited from lower oil costs . Exxon said it earned $ 1.5 billion , or $ 1.20 per share , in the fourth quarter , up from $ 1.4 billion , or $ 1.12 a share , the year before . Revenue was $ 27.84 billion , down from the fourth quarter of 1992 .
